overview: Samantha wakes up to find herself in the abyss of depression. Not wanting to continue to live this depraved life in a sea of hopelessness, she enlisted the help of a Christian therapist. What she soon discovers is horrifying yet freeing.  Director Debbie Harmon Writer Debbie Harmon Stars Kerri J. BaldwinApril BogenschutzAli Bullock
title: Psychology  of Secrets
